about_the_game:
《Dark Hunter》 is a fast-paced Roguelike dungeon exploration game.
Our Features:

Simple and stimulating Action Experience
The controls of Dark Hunter are very simple. The three hunters will automatically attack enemies within their attack range. Players can move to accumulate energy and then manually release more powerful skills at the right time. Of course, hunters can also use agile movements to dodge unknown dangers in the dungeon, but each active dodge consumes energy. We believe that your smart decisions will lead to the best outcomes in any situation.
﻿
A Trio of Mage, Assassin, and Archer
The team consists of a mage who masters ice and fire and excels in high-damage area attacks; an archer with ultra-long range, skilled at multi-directional and high-frequency attacks; and an assassin who can stealthily approach and eliminate enemies from behind. These three characters with distinct styles can be switched during combat, allowing you to create your own unique playstyle based on personal preference or dungeon characteristics. With randomly appearing character enhancements, each exploration promises a different gaming experience.






﻿
Character Development & Random Buffs
Opening treasure chests hidden in the dungeon corners can provide items to enhance the hunters' abilities. You can choose to prioritize developing your favorite character or pursue a well-rounded approach—it’s all up to you. Many dungeon levels also feature locations that offer buffs, known as "blessings." Approaching a blessing point allows you to choose from three buffs,including character-specific effects. These effects can not only increase the damage output of specific characters but also change gameplay styles.


﻿
More surprises await you in the dungeon. Play and explore for yourself. Thank you for your support and love; we hope our game brings you joy.

name: Dark Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 《Dark Hunter》 is an easy-to-play Roguelike dungeon exploration game. You will lead a team to defeat enemies in the dungeon. You can switch characters at any time during combat, and with random buffs, each exploration promises a unique gaming experience.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
